name: OnePlus 15T
highlights:
Not announced yet

Android 16, OxygenOS 16, ColorOS 16
256GB/512GB/1TB storage, no card slot

BODY.SIM:
· Nano-SIM + Nano-SIM + eSIM (max 2 at a time)
· Nano-SIM + Nano-SIM
BODY: IP68 dust tight and water resistant (immersible up to 1.5m for 30 min)

DISPLAY.Type: LTPO AMOLED, 1B colors, 165Hz, PWM, Dolby Vision, HDR10+, HDR Vivid

PLATFORM.Chipset: Qualcomm SM8850-AC Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 (3 nm)
PLATFORM.CPU: Octa-core (2x4.6 GHz Oryon V3 Phoenix L + 6x3.62 GHz Oryon V3 Phoenix M)

MAIN CAMERA.Dual:
50 MP, f/1.8, 24mm (wide), 1/1.56", 1.0µm, multi-directional PDAF, OIS
50 MP, f/2.0, (telephoto), 1/2.76", 0.64µm, 2x optical zoom, PDAF
MAIN CAMERA.Features: Color spectrum sensor, LED flash, HDR, panorama

COMMS.WLAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac/6/7, dual or tri-band, Wi-Fi Direct

FEATURES.Sensors: Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass

BATTERY.Charging:
80W wired, 33W PPS, 18W PD, 18W QC
5W reverse wired
